translation:
Lieutenant Colonel Manuel Lucas de Oliveira, who is marching with the brigade under his command to the municipality of Piratini; and who tomorrow or the day after will be on this side of the Picada, recommended that I ask Your Excellency General-in-Chief the demand from Your Excellency.

I take this opportunity to greet Your Excellency.

Note well Leite. I am heading to Piratini and I must go that way for better security.
